Name: Idania Roberta Sevilla Raudales
Description:
Idania Roberta owned a beauty Salon. She was killed in her own apartment. Her body was found more than 24 hours after the killing. The victim's hands and feet were tied together, and the throat showed the wound of a knife.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: La prensa, online portal, 29.11.2010

Name: Marcinha
Description:
Marcinha was shot in her own apartment.

TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2010)

Name: Sandra (Sandro Heleno)
Description:
Sandra was the owner of a boarding house for travestis. She was shot in the mouth.

TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2010) 2 ----------------------- Page 3-----------------------

Name: Valentina (Oscar Andres Triana Lozano)
Description:
Valentina's body was found on 28 November in a state of decomposition in a tank. She had been missing for eight days. The eyes and one hand were missing. Locals assume that swine living in the area ate the hand. Relatives belief that Valentina became a victim of hatred of travestis. She had moved from Medellin to Ibague recently.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Ecos del Combeima, online portal, 29.11.2010; El Tiempo, online portal (w/o date)

Name: Alison
Description:
Alison was a hairdresser and was found half naked.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Asociación Silueta X, 21.02.2011 December 2010

Name: Kirat  Pal
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Hindustan Times, 02.12.2010

Name: (Charm Ashwan) Williams
Description:
The victim was a sex worker.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: AP 05.12.2010, Go-Jamaica 05.12.2010, Mpetrelis Blog 08.12.2010 & Transgriot Blog 08.12.2010

Name: (Reinaldo Davino da Silva)
Description:
The victim's body was found on 5 December 2010 with marks of strangling on a piece of wasteland. The police suspect that the victim had a sexual relation with the perpetrator prior to the crime, as her cloths were down.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Aqui Acontece, online portal, 5.12.2010

Name: Mica (Michel Felipe Teles dos Santos)
Description:
Mica was killed by two gun shots on a public square called Ver-o-Rio in the evening. Mica was with ten friends, who stated that prior to the event, one of them had made a joke when a military police car passed. One of the police officers said "Go on laughing and you will see what is going to happen!". Around twenty minutes later, two men came on a motorbike. One of them got off the motorbike, pointed at Mica and said "Yes, it's you!". He fired two shots at Mica. Her friends called and ambulance and Mica died in hospital. According to friends and relatives, Mica had repeatedly been ridiculed by two police men and subjected to humiliating intimate body searches on the square Ver-o- Rio as well as in front of her own house.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: ORM online portal, 9.12.2010 4 ----------------------- Page 5-----------------------

Name: (Jocivaldo Alves)
Description:
The victim was from the nearby city of Urucuca and known for walking the streets of Ibirapitanga. Her body was found with stabbs all over her neck and ribcage.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Ubata Noticias, online portal, 9.12.2010

Name: Pamela (Edwin Franklin Sandoval Henao)
Description:
The victim was a sex worker and was presumably shot by a client. Her body was left on the highway where the crime took place.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El

Name: Nataly Rojas
Description:
Nataly had come from Spain shortly before she was killed.

TvT partner organization: Observatorio Ciudadano Trans

Name: N.N.
Description: TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2010)

Name: Farlen (Joabe Goncalves Chaves)
Description:
Farlen was a sex worker. She was shot at around 3.15 am, on a street where sex workers work by two unknown person on a motorbike.

TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2010) 5 ----------------------- Page 6-----------------------

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was clubbed to death with a wrench in the early morning. She was approximately 30 years old. Her body was found in a eucalyptus grove. Her legs and parts of her back were burnt. According to locals, the victim lived in the area and worked in her brother's beauty salon.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: A Gazeta Online, 18.12.10

Name: Diana
Description:
Diana was killed during a shoot-out in a place referred to as "el Pecado".

TvT partner organization: Observatorio Ciudadano Trans

Name: Lorenza Alexis Alvarado Hernandez
Description:
"Alexis Alvarado Hernandez was found dead, her body visibly beaten and burned. Bloody stones near her corpse indicate that the bruises covering her body were caused by stoning. Her body was set on fire. Used condoms found nearby have led to the suspicion that she may also have been raped. After her death, the assailants threw her body into a ditch. News reports indicate that severe injuries to her face rendered her corpse virtually unrecognizable." (IGLHRC website)

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Inter- American Commission on Human Rights, Press Release 4/11, 20.1.2011; IGLHRC website, 10.1.2011 6 ----------------------- Page 7-----------------------

Name: Lady Oscar (Oscar Martinez Salgado)
Description:
Lady Oscar was killed in her own apartment and set on fire. Her body showed wounds of several stabs. Neighbours reported to have seen two men running out of the apartment after it was set on fire, around 1 am. Relatives assume that Lady Oscar was stabbed and subsequently burnt. They say that no valuables were in the apartment, and that a month earlier, three men called Pununao, Loretao and Chamorrao attacked Lady Oscar and injured him on the throat.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El Heraldo, online journal, 23.12.2010; IGLHRC website, 10.1.2011

Name: Eduarda (Douglas Lermes Resende)
Location: Rua Desembargador Ermelino de Leao, Curitiba, PA
Description:
According to news reports, the victim was a travesti and was at a restaurant with four other travestis. Two men on a motorbike stopped in front of the restaurant. One of them held the doorman tight while the other one shot at the group. Another trans person got killed and three got injured.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: G1, online portal, 21. 12.10

Name: Mirela
Location: Rua Desembargador Ermelino de Leao, Curitiba, PA
Description:
According to news reports, the victim was a travesti of approximately 16 years of age. She was at a restaurant with four other travestis. Two men on a motorbike stopped in front of the restaurant. One of them held the doorman tight while the other one shot at the group. Another trans person got killed and three got injured.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: G1 online portal, 21.12.10 7 ----------------------- Page 8-----------------------

Name: (Carlos Bispo dos Santos)
Description: TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2010)

Name: Erica (Eric Pinheiro de Siqueira)
Description:
Erica was a sex worker and was shot eleven times in the night of the 25th.

TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2010)

Name: Luisa (Luis Rocha da Silva)
Location: Dr. Silvio Leite, Boa Vista, RR
Description:
Luisa was shot twice in the neck. Her body was found in her apartment on a chair. A neighbor reports having seen two persons running out of the apartment and driving away on a motorbike. The police assume she was executed.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Roraima Hoje, online portal, 28.12.2010

Name: Cheo Reana Bustamente
Description:
Cheo was a young travesti. Her body was found on 2 January 2011. "Her body was left without legal documentation. She appears to have died from a severe stab wound to her chest."

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: IGLHRC website, 10.1.2011; HRW website, 31.1.2011 8 ----------------------- Page 9-----------------------

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim's body was found shot on 13 December on a street.

Name: Jelwin Tolentino
Description:
The victim was probably a trans girl and was found dead without clothes.

Name: N.N.
Description:
According to witnesses, the victim was shot by persons who drove by in a vehicle.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Tribuna Online, online portal, 7.01.2011

Name: Genesis Briget Makaligton
Description:
Genesis was around 23 to 27 years of age. Her body was left in front of a pharmacy, next to the body of an unidentified man. According to media reports, the deaths occurred between 4 and 6 pm in different locations. The perpetrators immediately fled the scene.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: IGLHRC, online portal, 12.01.2011; Inter-American Commission on Human Rights, Press Release No 4/11, 20.01.2011 9 ----------------------- Page 10-----------------------

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim's was found on the 8th completely burnt in the forest area of La Marquesa. As the body did not show any wounds, the police assume the victim was burnt alive. She was around 30 years of age.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El Sol de Toluca, 9.1.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim is identified in the news as 'bading' and was allegedly salvaged by three people and dumped by the shore.

TvT partner organization. STRAP

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim's body was found in the morning of the 9th in a crouched position, leaned against a tree in a construction area. She was about 20 to 25 years old and her body had eight bullet wounds in the face, chest and arms.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: La Policiaca, online portal, 9.1.2011

Name: Adriana
Description:
According to the police, the crime happened around 9 pm on a highway. Adriana was working as a sex worker, waiting for clients. A car with two unidentified men is reported to have stopped nearby. One of them got out of the car and, without talking, fired numerous shots at Adriana.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: O Globo/A Gazeta Online, 13.01.11 10 ----------------------- Page 11-----------------------

Name: Krissy Bates
Description:
The victim was worried about her safety in the weeks leading up to the homicide, because she was sexually aussaulted. The murderer was a man the victim met online and started to date for a short time. The murderer confessed that he "dispatched" Bates by strangling her with his hands. He allegedly moved her body to the floor and saw it "jump." He told police he did not want her to "come back," so he took a folding knife from a hutch and stabbed Bates several times, according to the charges.  Bates' cause of death was complex homicidal violence, with four stab wounds to the torso and one to the left side of the neck. The victim also had broken ribs, and the hyoid bone in her throat was loosened, a sign of strangulation.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Star Tribune, 13.01.20011 & 21.01.2011

Name: N.N.
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: PB Agora, online portal, 16.01.2011

Name: Laisa (Jose Ramiro Guevara Cortes)
Description:
Laisa's body was found with a stab wound in the neck in the morning of the 30th in her apartment. According to a news report, she was very well-known in the local area. Public authorities assume that it was a homicide or murder.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Cronica del Quindio, 17.1..2011 11 ----------------------- Page 12-----------------------

Name: Fergie (William Afif Hernandez)
Description:
Fergie's body was found dead on a pavement in a residential area with gun shots in the head and the rib cage.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Athos GLS, online portal, 21.01.2011

Name: Angela (Angel Segundo Pirela Garcia)
Description:
Angela's body was found in the morning of the 17th on the side of a highway in the congregation of Francisco Eugenio Bustamante with shots in the temple, the cheekbone and the head. According to relatives, Angela had been working as a sex worker for three years in different parts of the city and been taking a course to become a hairdresser.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Noticia al Dia, online journal, 19.01.2011

Name: Marcia (Marcio Pereira)
Location: Rua Tufie Mahfud, Centro, Jaragua do Sul, SC
Description:
Marcia was a sex worker. According to a colleague who was nearby, Marcia had been in a car where there was a discussion. The police report that she was shot in the neck, and thrown out of the car. The perpetrator escaped the scene and Marcia died in the emergency room of a hospital. According to her sister, Marcia was from Itajai, but had been living in Jaragua for 15 years,

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: A Noticia Joinville, online journal, 20.01.2011 12 ----------------------- Page 13-----------------------

Name: Mini Britany (Lener Dario Lopez Fernandez)
Description:
Mini was killed in the early morning of the 22th on Calle Portachuelo. While public authorities assumed it was a act of vengeance related to a so-called crime of passion, the trans activist organisation Red-Trebol doubt this is true. Mini had been seen entering a car with two young men and two days later a witness saw the alleged perpetrators dispose Mini's body on a street.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El Dia, online journal, 24.01.11; La Prensa, online portal, 3.2.2011

Name: N.N.
Description: TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Mural-Toluca, online portal, 29.1.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was found dead with 20 stabs in the face and the stomach. The alleged perpetrator was the 37-year-old resident of the house in or near which the killing took place. He had already been charged with murder and was facing a long prison sentence.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Tem Mais, online portal, 22.01.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The crime happened in an amusement park in the early morning. On 26 January, the police arrested a man who confessed having stabbed the victim after a discussion.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: VNews, online portal, 24.01.2011 & 26.01.2011 13 ----------------------- Page 14-----------------------

Name: Natasha (Joao Leandro Rosario dos Santos)
Location: Avenida Juscelino Kubitschek de Oliveira, Cidade Industrial, Curitiba
Country: Avenida Juscelino Kubitschek de Oliveira, Cidade Industrial, Curitiba
Description:
Natasha was killed on a street where she used to do sex work. According to relatives, she did not have a stable home. The police inform that she had been subject to two attempted murders. According to her aunt, in one of these attacks, one of the aunt's nephews was severely injured.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Parana Online, online portal, 25.01.11

Name: Mariana (Jose Daniel Aricuri)
Description:
Mariana was well-known in the area. She was a sex worker. Her body was found on the 29th on a hill near the city of Oran with 30 machete stabs, mostly in the face. The hands were missing as they had been eaten by swine that are kept by locals and by dogs. The police assume that Mariana was killed at a different place and her body been carried to the hillside around four days earlier.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: 26 Noticias, online portal, 31.1.2011

Name: (Ivo Valentin)
Location: Avenida Marechal Floriano Peixoto, Curitiba, PR
Description:
The victim's body was found dead on the morning of 25 January 2011 with at least three shots in the face. Her panties had been lowered.

TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2011); Crimes Curitiba, online portal, 25.01.2011

Name: N.N.

Name: Nicol Balanta
Description:
Nicole was killed by a man using the name "El Tigre".

Name: (Luis Fernando Ormeno)
Description:
The victim was killed with a bottleneck. She was from the city of Manabi and identified by friends.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El Universo, online portal, 16.2.2011 18 ----------------------- Page 19-----------------------

Name: Moni (Roberto Marcos) Castro
Description:
Moni had been well known in the General Rodriquez district of Buenos Aires in the 1980s, as she was a prominent hairdresser. Since the 90s, she was known in the nearby district of Moreno. Moni was shot shortly before midnight on a street where she used to do sex work. She was with a colleague as two young men on a motorbike approached her. An exchange followed that ended with one of the men shooting Moni. Moni told her colleague that the men wanted to rob her before she collapsed. She died in hospital.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Semanario Actualidad, blog, 10.3.2011

Name: Capenga (Eduardo Marinho da Silva)
Location: Rua Macedo de Aguiar, Salvador, BA
Description:
Capenga's body was found on a piece of wasteland showing wounds of beatings, stabs and strangulation. According to residents, Capenga, who was a sex worker, went with a client to the wasteland where the murder happened.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Tribuna da Bahia, online portal, 15.02.2011

Name: Poh Hiao Peng/ Pondan Peng
Description:
The victim was beaten to death with a hammer by a motorcyclist in the afternoon. The case has been classified as murder.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: The Star, 15.02.2011 19 ----------------------- Page 20-----------------------

Name: Mireya (Ramiro Solano Jimenez)
Description:
La Mireya was stabbed to death in the early morning by a 22 year-old men who had been robbed previously on his way home from a bar and was reported to have wanted to take revenge on someone, killing Mireya, who was not involved in the robbery.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Dia a Dia, online portal, 18.2.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim and the murderer were reported to had been exchanging sms and mms for six years before they met. When the younger person discovered the 29 year-old was a 'man' he committed murder.

TvT Expert Questionnaire on the Social and Legal Situation of Trans People / Trans-Fuzja Foundation Poland

Name: Tyra Trent
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Baltimore Sun, 04.03.2011

Name: Aline (Rugian Oneil de Carlos)
Location: Rua Francisco Pezzi, Caxias do Sul, RS
Description:

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Pioneiro, online journal, 21.02.2011 20 ----------------------- Page 21-----------------------

Name: (Víctor Jose) Cruz Escorcia
Description:
The victim was a sex worker. The perpetrators shot her seven times and fled. As she had received death threats three days before, the police speculate it might have been a crime of vengeance.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El Quetzalteco, 24.2.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was about 55 years old. The body was found in a state of decomposition in a creek. It is estimated that the body had been in the water for about three months.

Name: Jessica (Sergio Viana)
Location: Avenida Lucas Nogueira Garcez, Sao Bernardo do Campo, SP
Description:
Jessica was found dead at 10:15 pm in her car. Her body had two shots, one in the head and one in the neck. Nothing was stolen. A relative told the authorities that Jessica had lived openly as travesti since she was 22 and was much liked in the area.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Diario do ABC, online journal, 25.2.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was found dead on a road in Baguio, stabbed at the back and head and with signs of torture.

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was found dead along the road of Brgy Asin East of Malasiqui town with signs of torture.

TvT partner organization: STRAP

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was found dead along the road of Brgy Gueguesangen, Santa Barbara town with a wound on the forehead and a stab wound in the armpit and with signs of torture through strangulation.

TvT partner organization: STRAP March 2011

Name: Priscila Loura (Gustavo Brandao Aguilar)
Description:
Priscila was shot nine times by two young men. She was a sex worker, working in the area. The police suspect  24 year-old Fernando Túlio Miranda Lage (Pimpolho), a drug boss, and a 17 year-old adolescent to have committed the crime. A third men might have been involved as

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Super Noticia, online portal, 3.3.2011, 4.3.2011, Noticias Terra, 4.4.2011 22 ----------------------- Page 23-----------------------

Name: Val (Valdecir) das Graças Souza
Description:
Val was a sex worker. She was killed in the early morning with four gunshots shortly after she was seen leaving with a client on a motorbike.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Radio Cultura Foz, online portal, 6.03.2011

Name: Andrea
Description:
Andrea fell into a ravine, and public authorities impeded her rescue by community members. As a result, she was washed away by the current. According to the human rights organization Personeria de Medellin it was a murder.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Personeria de Medellin, Boletin de Prensa No. 159, 21.10.2011

Name: Casandra (Samuel Oliva Bautista)
Description:
Casandra worked at a bar. She was beaten to death with a hard object after she had been seen leaving the bar. Her body was found near a streat in Cunduacan. Her family suspect the crime was committed by Casandra's partner, who had severly injured her in January 2011.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Tabasco Hoy, online portal, 9.3.2011

Name: (Marcal) Camero Tye
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: CBS News, 09.03.2011 23 ----------------------- Page 24-----------------------

Name: Shakira (Faizal Harahap)
Description:
The victim and two other transgender women were shot by two unidentified assailants in a red light district who fired shots at agroup of transgender people. The other two transgender women survived.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Jakarta Post, 10.03.2011 & 17.04.2011

Name: Tininha (Roncon)
Description:
Tininha was reportedly in the company of a lover, the travesti Marcia on the day she was killed. As nothing was stolen, the police discarded robbery as the motif of the crime.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: O Atibaiense, 16.03.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was shot four times by an unknown person on a motorbike.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: O Liberal, online portal, 12.03.2011

Name: La Jenny (Michel Ruiz Lopez)
Description:
La Jenny was found dead on the night of the 12th in her own apartment. She was strangled with a fabric belt. The police suspected that La Jennys partner, another travesti or her partner could have committed the crime, however without any substantive indications.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Diario de Quintana Roo, 16.3.2011 24 ----------------------- Page 25-----------------------

Name: R. Suresh
Location: Angala Parameswari Amman Temple, Chennai, Tamil Nadu

The victim was killed by a man, she met at a temple festival and with whom she went to an isolated place.

The victim was found near a bus station. According to witnesses, the victim was asked to come to that place and then clubbed to death.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: JC Online 17.03.2009

Name: Andrea
Description:
Andrea was a sex worker and killed by a passer-by.

TvT partner organization: Observatorio Ciudadano Trans

Name: N.N.

The victim was shot four times in the head and back during daytime. According to witnesses, a man fired shots from a motorbike and fled the scene.

Name: (Javier Ortega Rodriguez)
Description:
The vicitm was a well-known stylist. Relatives had found the body after they had forcefully entered the victim's apartment, who had not responded. The police assume it was a robbery.

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was shot to death point-blank along with a man.

Name: (Osimar Sebastião de Souza Júnior)
Description:
The victim's body was found by firemen on a street in the neighbourhood of Novo Horizonte. The victim died when entering into hospital.

Name: (Marcos Jose Pereira da Silva)
Description:
The victim was a sex worker. She was tortured, together with her partner Jaime, for around one hour inside their own apartment. They were subsequently dragged outside and shot several times. Jaime managed to escape and survived with two shots in the arm. According to the victim's mother, who lives nearby, six men and two women had entered their apartment after breaking the door.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Folha de Pernambuco, online portal, March 2011 26 ----------------------- Page 27-----------------------

Name: S. P.
Description:
The victim was found dead on a street with her legs and head cut off from her body.

TvT partner organisation: Pembe Hayat (Pink Life), Ankara

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim's body was found in a deserted area. The deth resulted from severe blows on the head with a hard object.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Diario de Morelos, online journal, 24.3.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim's body was found in the sector of Tubo in Bello Oriente. The victim was about 17 to 20 years old.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Personeria de Medellin, Boletin de Prensa No. 159, 21.10.2011

Name: Jessica
Description:
Jessica was a sex worker. According to colleagues, she was on the street with other sex workers when a person came near and called her. As Jessica went over, the person stabbed her with a knife three times and fled. Her colleagues brought her to hospital, where she reportedly was not provided immediate treatment and died.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: La Voz, online journal, 27.3.2011 27 ----------------------- Page 28-----------------------

Name: Leidy Garcia
Description:
The victim was of Ecuadorian descent.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El Tiempo 30.03.2011

Name: Brenda Vanessa Viveros Peralta
Description:
Brenda was a stylist.

TvT partner organization: Observatorio Ciudadano Trans

Name: N.N.
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: D24AM, online portal/Movimento de Gays, Lésbicas, Bissexuais, Travestis e Transexuais (GLBTT) do Amazonas, 10.4.2011

Name: N.N.
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: D24AM, online portal/Movimento de Gays, Lésbicas, Bissexuais, Travestis e Transexuais (GLBTT) do Amazonas, 10.4.2011

Name: N.N.
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: D24AM, online portal/Movimento de Gays, Lésbicas, Bissexuais, Travestis e Transexuais (GLBTT) do Amazonas, 10.4.2011 28 ----------------------- Page 29----------------------- April 2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was shot around ten times.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: O Fluminense, online journal, 2.04.2011

Name: Grace (Eroni) da Silva
Location: Avenida Valdomiro Cândido dos Reis, Capão da Canoa, RS
Description:
Grace was shot to death at around 5 pm with six gun shots. According to witnesses, a man approached Grace and fired the shots and left as if nothing had happened.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Literal em Movimento, online portal, 7.04.2011

Name: Zharick (Jeison Andres Molano)
Description:
Zharick was killed in her own apartment around 10.30 am. A man from the same building, with whom Zharick had had a relationship, had come by in the early in a drunken state and after a discussion strangled Zharick with a DVD cable. It is assumed that the murder might be related to robbery, as Zharick is reported to have told her mother two days earlier that she withdrew three million pesos for a nose operation, which was not found after the crime along with some valuable objects.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Qhubo Ibague, blog, 11.4.2011 29 ----------------------- Page 30-----------------------

Name: Paulinha (Paulo) César de Oliveira
Description:
Paulihna was murdered in a brutal way with 31 knife stabs in different body parts. She was reportedly a well-known charwoman who worked for several established families in the town.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: MGA, online portal, 13.04.2011

Name: Rafaela Thompson (Heliu Pereira Dantas)
Location: Av. Antonio Quintino Gomes, Vilhena, RO
Description:
Rafaela's body was found partly naked on 11 April and seems to have been strangled with a piece of cloth. According to the police, Rafaela

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Rondonia Vip, online portal, 11.4.2011, Folha de Vilhena, 11.4.2011

Name: Beyonce (Andre Luis) Nascimento dos Santos
Location: Avenida Dorival Caymmi, Itapua, Salvador da Bahia, BA
Description:
The victim was shot in the thigh at around 5 am by two men in a passing car. The victim was taken to an emergency station, but the bullet hit a femoral vein causing death.

TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2011); Correio 24 Horas, online portal, 14.4.2011 30 ----------------------- Page 31-----------------------

Name: Inete (Daniel Oliveira Felipe)
Location: Rua Pres. Joao Pessoa, Campina Grande, PB
Description:
Inete was a sex worker. She was stabbed around 30 times and died on the street. A CCTV camera recorded how four men came out of a car and then chased and attacked Inete. The police arrested a 42 year-old and a 25 year-old man and a 17 year-old adolescent and are looking a further man. The adolescent confessed the crime. The police assume that vengance was the motive, based on the perpetrators' statement.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Gay 1 online portal, 15.4.2011, UOL online portal, 18.4.2011; PB Agora online portal, 29.4.2011

Name: (Armando Cabrera Martinez)
Location: San Martin Texmelucan de Labastida, Puebla
Description:
The victim's body was found in a river in very dark water with a big stone on the head. The victim had been stabbed in the neck and the face was smashed with a very heavy stone. The medical experts also found injuries that suggest that the victim was tortured and violated by homophobic persons before being killed.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; El  Despertar, online portal, 19.4.2011

Name: Kali
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Dawn News, 18.04.2011

Name: Waseem
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Dawn News, 18.04.2011 31 ----------------------- Page 32-----------------------

Name: Cristal Sodi (David Reyes)
Description:
Cristals body was found burnt in her own apartment. Relatives believe that Cristal was murdered.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Telenoticias/Youtube, 18.4.2011; TRANSSA website (trans organization) 20.4.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim's body was found on 23 April 2011 in a state of decay wrapped in a bag and with the little finger of the left hand cut off. Forensic authorities estimate the killing to have happened on 19 April. The body was found in Chotepe, which is near the city of San Pedro Sula, where on 17 January 2011 the travesti Fergie was killed.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; La Tribuna online portal, 23.4.2011

Name: Narin B.
Description:
The victim was a trans woman. She was taken to hospital shortly after the gunshot, but died before reaching the hospital. Other transwomen, M. K., 26, and Y. E.,36, were injured and taken to hospital. The attackers were arrested by the police.

TvT partner organisation: Pembe Hayat (Pink Life), Ankara

Name: Ale (Gustavo Yagualca)
Description:
Ale was a sex worker and found dead hung on a tree on the San Bernardo hill. Although the police investigated the case as a possible homicide, there are indications that it was a murder and other travestis and collegues of Ale believe that Ale was killed.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El Tribuno, online portal, 28.4.2011 32 ----------------------- Page 33-----------------------

Name: Bibi (Mauricio)
Description:
Bibi was killed in around 3:30 am in an apartment, but no details are reported as to how she got there or whose apartment it was. According to witnesses, Bibi, who was a sex worker, left with a trucker and did not return to the place near a petrol station where she used to stand.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Rondonia ao Vivo, online portal, 27.4.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was found stuffed into the trunk of an automobile.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Real Acapulco News, 01.05.2011

Name: Kimberly Rubí Bianconi López
Description:
Kimberly had moved to Caracas a year before she was killed, where she worked first as a hairdresser and then in a perfumery. She was killed in the early morning of 30 April together with a friend of hers, another travesti called La Dominicana. Both had been seen entering a blue Chevrolet Aveo and being pushed out half an hour later. A men was also seen leaving the car, who the police belief to be the perpetrator.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Diario Digital Transexual, online portal, 9.5.2011 33 ----------------------- Page 34-----------------------

Name: La Domenicana
Description:
La Domenicana worked in a perfumery. She was killed in the early morning of 30 April together with a friend of hers, another travesti called Kimberly. Both had been seen entering a blue Chevrolet Aveo and being pushed out half an hour later. A men was also seen leaving the car, who the police belief to be the perpetrator.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Diario Digital Transexual, online portal, 9.5.2011 May 2011

Name: (Jean Carlos Pereira da Silva)
Description:
The victim was stabbed to death in the back with a knife in front of a bar. According to the police various persons had been in the bar drinking and after the victim stole 10 reais from a man there was a short discussion. After several hours, the victim left towards home and José Ronaldo de Almeida, 32, who had been waiting in a thicket reportedly committed the crime. The perpetrator fled the scene.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: CNews, online portal, 2.5.2011

Name: Preta Gil (Andrey) Barbosa
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Blog do Pablo, blog, 23.06.2011; Grupo 28 de Junho, LGBT group/Eugenhio 28, blog, 20.06.2011 34 ----------------------- Page 35-----------------------

Name: Barbara (Abraham Lopez Lezama)
Description:
The victim was a sex worker and was killed in her own apartment by a client who beat her with a shoe, strangled her and gave her a deadly blow on the head. She was found dead by a friend, also a travesti, who informed the authorities. The perpetrator fled the apartment but has been identified by the police.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: E- consulta, online portal/Foto Agencia Enfoque, 1.5.2011, En Interiores,

Name: Naomi (Leonel Carmona Adames)
Description:
Naomis body was found in a pool of blood, a 5 gallon gas container standing next to her head.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Jancavacs, online portal, 6.5.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The vicitm's body was found with gunshots in the head and leg on a street. It is assumed that the killing happened in a different location.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Hoje em Dia, online portal, 11.05.2011 35 ----------------------- Page 36-----------------------

Name: (Felipe Roberto) de Freitas Silva
Description:
According to the police, the victim was at home when two men came in order to kill the victim. The victim, according to the report, went to get a two year-old child so that the men would not shoot, but they shot nonetheless, injuring the child as well as her grandmother who tried to protect the child, and killing the victim. Due to information given by the victim's father and further reports, the police suspect a relation to drug trafficking.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Record Minas, online portal, 12.05.2011

Name: Luisa Nicol (Luis Alberto) Valera
Description:
Luisa's alleged murderers were arrested. They belong to a gang that exploits trans and gay sex workers.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Venezuela Diversa, 14.05.2011

Name: N.N.
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Folha de Pernambuco, online portal, 18.05.11

Name: Paloma
Description:
Paloma was a young travesti. She was clubbed to death in the bathroom of a construction site.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Journal Atual, online portal, 5.08.2011 36 ----------------------- Page 37-----------------------

Name: Monica (Javier Ernesto) Elizondo
Description:
Monica was shot while riding on a public bus.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Prensa Libre, online portal, 24.5.2011

Name: (Milda Rusel Aguilar Donis)
Location: Santa Rosa de Lima, Santa Rosa
Description:
The victim was shot as several persons attacked a group standing in front of a bar. A woman, the bar owner, was also killed. Another man was injured.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; La Pagina online portal, 21.5.2011

Name: Alison Pereira Cabral dos Anjos (Camile)
Location: Rua Doutor Edgard Teotônio Santana, Sao Paulo, SP
Description:
Alison was shot by a client at around 8.30 pm. She reportedly owed him 10 reais as she did not have change when he paid. The man came back with a gun and shot her at least seven times. A witness reported the license plate of the motorcycle on which the perpetrator fled.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: estadao/Sao Paulo, online portal, 27.5.2011

Name: Alicinha (Alisson Otavio) da Cruz
Description:
Alicinha's body was found in a stream in a state of decay with marks of strangling on the neck in the stream Gumita. Alicinha's body had additionally been dragged by a car and then been thrown into a sewer. The police were investigating for homophobia and drug-related vengeance. They relate the case to the murder of Mailda dos Santos, which happened on 8 June 2011 in the same area of Cuiaba.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Gay 1 online portal, 30.5.11, 14.6.2011. 37 ----------------------- Page 38-----------------------

Name: (Roberto Confessor da Silva)
Description:
The victim was killed with two gunshots in the early morning when returning home. According to locals, the alleged perpetrator had a sexual relationship with the victim.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Paraiba News, online portal, 18.10.2011

Name: (Alexandre dos Anjos)
Description:
The victim's body was found naked with a piece of wood next to it that had been used to kill the victim.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Jorge Quixabeira, online portal, 31.05.2011

Name: Levinha
Description:
According to Grupo Gay da Bahia, the murder was based on 'homophobia'.

TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2011) 38 ----------------------- Page 39----------------------- June 2011

Name: N.N.
Description: TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2011)

Name: Matilde (Josimar)
Description:
The victim was around 25 years old. The body was found on the morning of 2 June on a piece of wasteland.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; La Tarde, online portal, 2.6.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was around 30 years old and, according to witnesses, was shot by the driver of a black Ford Lobo, who after committing the killing fled the scene.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Mileno, online portal, 3.6.2011

Name: Karlota (Carlos Alfredo Gomez Pena)
Description:
Before Karlota was killed, two persons in an old car approached several trans women whether they had seen Karlota. One of the trans women reported that one of the individuals showed a firearm to the ones they asked. Nobody informed the police.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; El Nuevo Dia, online portal, 6.6..2011 39 ----------------------- Page 40-----------------------

Name: Mailda dos Santos (Maria do Bairro)
Description:
Mailda's body was found by a student who called the police. The circumstances of the murder are reported to have been similar to the murder of Alicinha, which occurred on 28 May 2011 in the same area of Cuiaba.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Gay 1 online portal, 9.6.11, 14.6.2011.

Name: Carla (Juan Carlos) Tovar Cardenas
Description:
Carla's body was found around a week after she disappeared. Her body showed marks of multiple stabs and severe beatings. Three adolescents of 14 and 16 years of age were arrested and faced charges.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; El Occidental, online portal, 12.6.2011

Name: (Nathan Eugene Davis)
Description:
The victim was shot in the head near an apartment block where the victim was reported to have worked as a sex worker. The body was found near an apartment complex dumpster. The police have released a sketch of the alleged perpetrator, who is assumed to be a man in his late 20s to early 30s.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Houston Press, blog, 13.6.2011, 14,6.2011; Click 2 Houston, online portal, 13.6.2011 40 ----------------------- Page 41-----------------------

Name: Kenia (Lineker) Silva Nascimento
Location: Av. Deodoro da Fonseca, Natal, RN
Description:
The killing happened at around 8.30 pm. The victim was on the intersection of Avenida Deodoro da Fonseca and General Osorio in Natal as a car approached and one of three persons fired shots at the victim, who died on the location. One of the lines the police are investigating is homophobia.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Tribuna do Norte, online journal, 21.6.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The police suspect that the perpetrators took the victim to the location of the killling, and when the victim resisted hit the victim to death with stones.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Noticia Al Dia, online portal, 19.6.2011

Name: Karla
Description:
Karla was severely beaten on the head.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011

Name: Casandra (Marco Fidel Luján) Hernández
Description:
According to one hypothesis, Casandra was killed because she had witnessed another homicide

Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Tribuna do Norte, online journal, 21.06.2011

Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Tribuna do Norte, online journal, 21.6.201 1 July 2011

Name: Thalia
Description:
Numerous shots were fired from a passing car at Thalia and other trans women that were together with her.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011 42 ----------------------- Page 43-----------------------

Name: N.N.
Description: TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011

Name: Cinthia (Roberto Marcelino) Gonzalez Garrido Rodriguez
Description:
Cinthia's body was found with a gash in the neck three days after she had disappeared in an space she rented in the city of El Loa. A young man was arrested and suspected the crime. He worked in for a contract firm and was reported to have a problem with drugs.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; En Sentido Contrario, online portal, 14.7.2011; Emol Chile, online portal, 14.7.2011

Name: Shayara (Johny) Soares Santana Pereira
Location: Rua Nair Silva, Belford Roxo, RJ
Description:
Shayara was a sex worker and clubbed to death in the early morning. After her death, family members started a public campaign, since the police did not seem to be investigating the crime seriously.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: R7 Videos, online portal, 12.11.2011

Name: Val (Valter Felipe) de Souza
Description:
Val was at a bar dancing with friends in the afternoon when two men drove by on a motorbike and fired shots at them. Two persons got hit and injured and Val was shot to death. The police assume prejudice against LGBT people to be a possible reason for the crime.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Folha de Rondonia, online portal, 21.07.2011 43 ----------------------- Page 44-----------------------

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was approximately 25 years old and died in hospital from shots in the head, shoulder and hand. According to first-aiders, the victim did not live in the area and was shot point-blank by unknown persons who fled the scene.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Prensa Libre, online portal, 18.7.2011

Name: Lashai Mclean
Description:
Shot by two men at a sex worker's place.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Washington Blade, 25.07.2011

Name: Samantha (Jesus Nazareth Rondon)
Description:
Samantha had moved to Caracas from Margarita several months ago and worked in the beauty industry. She had been with her friend Brenda on Avenida Libertador in the early morning. Brenda left to get some drinks, and when she returned, Samantha had disappeared. According to witnesses, a person in a car had come by and kidnapped Samantha. She was shot six times and stolen numerous belongings. Brenda reported that Samantha had been beaten before after leaving work because she was transgender.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; El Universal, online portal, 24.7.2011

Name: Didem
Description:
The murderer was a 26 year-old man, who met with Didem on facebook and agreed to have sex by paying her. He was caught by the

TvT partner organization Pembe Hayat 44 ----------------------- Page 45----------------------- August 2011

Name: Camila Guzman
Description:
Camila was found with several stabs in her back. Her boyfriend confessed the murder. The relationship was described as abusive, e.g. the boyfriend stole items from Camila.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: The Advocate, 23.08.2011

Name: N.N.
Location: Rua Sílvia, Piedade, Rio de Janeiro, RJ
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: O Globo, online portal, 6.08.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim's body was found buring in the early morning on a street.

Description:
The victims body was found partly burnt near a highway.

Name: Wajahat
Description:
Wajahat, a transgender woman, was shot together with her partner after the two decided to marry by two men who entered their house and shot them to death.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: The News, 15.08.2011

Name: Baby (Alexandro) Lourenço Gonçalves
Description:
Baby was shot by a woman on 16 August after an argument they had during a music event. She died the following day in hospital.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Espresso PB, online portal, 17.08.2011

Name: Roberta (Alberto) Machado Amorim
Description:
According to the police, six men, among them Roberta's ex boyfriend Tata (Edmar Antunes de Jesus), surprised Roberta at home and tortured her in order to get money that she and Tata had gained from selling a house. After three hours of using extreme forms of torture, the men killed Roberta. While the five other men were arrested, Tata was still fugitive.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Canal Reis, online portal, w/o date; Gterra, online portal, 16.09.2011 46 ----------------------- Page 47-----------------------

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was around 29 years old. The body was found with stab wounds and marks of strangulation near a cart track. As the victim did not have any relatives in the area, neighours suspect that she was from El Salvador. She was last seen on the night of 19 August in a disco, and some persons, who were possibly the perpetrators, picked her up. According to the authorities, her body showed signs of sexual abuse.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Prensa Libre, online portal, 20.8.2011

Name: La Frutera (Ender Antonio Serrano Rodríguez)
Description:
La Frutera was from the city of El Virgia and used to come to Merida

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El Diario de los Andes, online journal, 23.08.2011

Name: (Víctor Manuel) Ulloa Morales
Description:
Unknown persons forcefully entered the victim's apartment in the early morning and shot the victim in the head.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El Heraldo, online journal, 1.09.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The alleged murderer was a 33 year-old man, who was arrested by the police.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Times of India 25.08.2011 47 ----------------------- Page 48----------------------- September 2011

Name: Adriana

Adriana was severely beaten in the early morning of 5 September. She was taken to an emergency station but had already died when arriving there.

Name: Luana (Wagner) de Oliveira Batista

Name: Suzi (Benedito) Divino da Silva
Description:
Suzi worked at night clubs. Her body was found with marks of strangulation and stab wounds in the morning of 8 September.

Name: Simone (Carleone) Santos Rodrigues
Description:
Simone was a sex worker. Two men were seen entering her apartment at around 5 pm and leaving again with blood on their hands. The police was called at 5.40 pm, and arrived only around 9 pm. Simone was stabbed at least 17 times.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Atlantica News, online portal, September 2011; Ocorrencia Policial Bahia, blog, 10.09.2011; Rota 51, online portal, 9.09.2011

Name: Gaurav Gopalan
Description:
The victim was a latina transgender woman. The shooting was the fourth in a series of attacks against trans people in Washington. Two days later another trans woman was shot and survived.

Name: (Carlos Eduardo) Ferreira de Oliveira
Location: Rua Dr Otávio Tarquino, Nova Iguacu, RJ
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Bandeira G, online portal, 22.09.2011

Name: Brigitte
Description:
Brigitte was a prominent sex worker in Veracruz. According to a report that was not officially confirmed, Brigitte was killed in an apartment in the district of Boca del Rio.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Terra, online portal, 21.09.2010

Name: (Jorge Alexis) Ortiz Hernández
Description:
Two men on a motorbike fired numerous shots in the early morning at a group of trans women who were sex workers, killing one and injuring two, the 18 year-old 'Jhon Jairo Rodriguez' and 19 year-old 'Yeritson Camacho'. The authorities consider 'homophobia' to be a possible motif of the attack.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: La Nacion, online journal, 19.09.2011

Name: La Denisse (Adolfo Rivera Hurtado)
Description:
La Denisse was from Tlaltizapán. She was stabbed to death in a bar in the early morning and died in hospital. It is reported that she had been arguing with a man who had beaten a woman. The man left the bar and came back and stabbed La Denisse in the back.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Diario de los Morelos, online journal, 20.09.2011 50 ----------------------- Page 51-----------------------

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was a sex worker and her body was found on a beach with marks of beatings on the head.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Folha de Pernambuco, online portal, October 2011; Mix Brasil, online portal, 28.09.2011

Name: Lucie Parkin
Description:
The police says that the victim was killed, because she owned the perpetrator money.

Name: N.N.

The victim's body was found in the morning at a bus stop.

Description: TvT partner organization Pembe Hayat

Name: N.N.
Description: TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2011) 51 ----------------------- Page 52----------------------- October 2011

Name: Paloma Perez
Description:
The victim's body was found under a bridge in a garbage bag and showed signs of utter cruelity. After strangling the victim, the perpetrators stabbed, beheaded and burnt the victim's body.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Nuevo Ojo, online portal, 3.10.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim's body was found naked and covered with litter bags in a canal, showing stab wounds in the chest, arms, hands and knees. The authorities belief the killing was committed in a different location.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Noticia al Dia, online journal, 4.10.2011

Name: Tierrita (José Manuel Concepción)
Description:
Tierrita was a sex worker and lived in the district of Villa Mella.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El Nacional, online journal, 5.10.2011 52 ----------------------- Page 53-----------------------

Name: Paloma (Joaquim) Rodrigues da Cunha
Description:
Paloma was run over by a car. According to witnesses, she was using crack and, experiencing a psychotic crisis, she threw herself onto a highway, where she was killed. A smoking pipe was found nearby that the police belief belonged to Paloma.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Jangadeiro, online portal, 6.10.2011

Name: Ramazan Cetin
Description:
The victim was shot by her brother in a hospital in front of other patients. It was a tranphobic hate crime. The brother confessed to the police, that he killed her, becuase she "was engaged in transvestism" and that he "cleansed his honour". The victim was suffering from violence from her family before.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: TvT partner organization Pembe Hayat & The Advocate, 08.10.2011

Name: Ceci (Rubén Rolando Montenegro)
Description:
Ceci was a sex worker. She was shot in the head and shoulder in a hostel. Pablo Alejandro Peralta was arrested and charged with murder.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El Siglo, online portal, 12.10.2011 53 ----------------------- Page 54-----------------------

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim's body was found in a garbage bag under the table in the apartment of 21 year-old Germán Alejo Torres, after neighbours had noticed a strong smell and called the police. The head, arms and legs had been cut off and put on the pavement to be picked up by the refuse collection. Torres confessed the crime. The victim could be identified preliminarily due to a tatoo and was presumably a sex worker.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: La Voz, online journal, 16.10.2011

Name: Joana (Sergio Ricardo) Faria
Description: TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2011)

Name: (Jefferson) Diogo de Cezaro
Location: Rua Bento Gonçalves, Caxias do Sul, RS
Description:
The victim was strangled and thrown out of a car. A witness reported the car's plate number to the police, who arrested the car owner and a second man.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Rede Trans, online portal,

Name: Elisa Sabatella Brasil
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Thonny Hawany, blog, 18.10.2011 54 ----------------------- Page 55-----------------------

Name: (Maicon Michel) Cardoso da Silva Westenhofen
TGEU ref: 15 Oct 2011/(Maicon Michel) Cardoso da Silva Westenhofen
Description:
The victim's body was found with marks of torture and a stab wound in the chest in the river Taquari. The police belief that the victim was killed on the weekend of 15/16 October, as the victim was missing since 15 October.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Gazeto do Sul, online portal, 19.10.2011

Name: (José de Arimatéia da Silva)
Description:
The victim was from the city of Campina Grande. The mother stated she suspected prejudice to be the reason of the murder.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Gay 1, online portal, 17.10.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was killed with two other people during a private party by militants coming from outside of the village, who entered the party and opened fire killing three people and injuring two people. The locals said the attack won't affect their morale.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: The Express Tribune, 20.10.2011

Name: Lulu
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Personeria de Medellin, Boletin de Prensa No. 159, 21.10.2011 55 ----------------------- Page 56-----------------------

Name: Talha
Description:
The victim was shot in a shop, when resisting a robbery.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Daily Times, 23.10.2011

Name: Dudu (Eduardo) Paixão de Jesus
Description:
The victim had survived an attempted murder the previous year, where Dudu was shot six times.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Grupo Contra o Preconceito, blog, 24.10.2011

Name: N.N.
Location: Rua Professor Onésimo Silveira, Sao Paulo, SP
Description:
Two travestis were found dead in a park on 23 October.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Camacari Noticias/Grupo Contra o Preconceito, 24.10.2011

Name: N.N.
Location: Rua Professor Onésimo Silveira, Sao Paulo, SP
Description:
Two travestis were found dead in a park on 23 October.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Camacari Noticias/Grupo Contra o Preconceito, 24.10.2011 56 ----------------------- Page 57-----------------------

Name: (Cristian Yoneiker) Torres Escuraima
Description:
Various persons fired shots at a group of sex workers in the early morning. 'Cristian' was shot at least 20 times. He had told a relative that it had occurred several times already that shots had been fired at them only to scare them and make them run away.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: La Nacion, online journal, 23.10.2011

Name: Shelley 'Treasure' Hilliard
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Detroit News, 10.11.2011

Name: Malu (Antenor Manoel) dos Santos Moraes
Location: Avenida Rio Madeira, Porto Velho, RO
Description:
The victim was a sex worker and was stabbed by a supposed client who had already attacked another travesti sex worker several days before. The police was looking for the perpetrator.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Rondoniagora/Jornal Policial, 25.10.2011

Name: „Luis“ Chichay Kano („The Key“)
Description:
The victim was set on fire after a dispute with her partner. She died 8 dies later in the hospital.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Latin America Current Evenets, 24.10.2011 57 ----------------------- Page 58-----------------------

Name: Fogao (Adilson) Ferreira Rodrigues
Description:
Fogao's body was found in the morning in near a gymnasium. Next to the body, two knifes and a brick with marks of blood were found.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: TV Alterosa, online portal, 24.10.2011; Jornal Fama, online portal, 25.10.2011

Name: Gabi (Davi) Pereira Dantas
Description:
Gabi had moved to Lagarto from the city of Aracaju shortly before being killed in order to work as a cleaner.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Sergipe Hoje, online portal, 28.10.2011

Name: La Moma (Sebastián Manuel González Abad)
Description:
La Moma's body was found half-naked and in a state of putrefaction on her bed with a scarf around her neck. Her brother called the police.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El Dia, online journal, 9.11.11 58 ----------------------- Page 59----------------------- st         th November 1   to 14                  2011

Name: Jessica Rollon
Description:
The victim was a sex worker of Brazilian descent and living in Italy since 2005. Italian NGO's complained about the transphobic way in which the murder was reported in local media.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Eco di Bergamo, 03.11.2011 & GayWave.it 08.11.2011

Name: Luana (Kelvin) de Oliveira Moreira
Description:
Luana was a sex worker from the city of Uberaba. She was shot to death when she walked home with the perpetrator and a colleague of hers. Although her colleague identified the perpetrator, the police only took his testimony and did not arrest him immediately.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Plantao Policial de Rio Verde-Goias, 2.11.2011 & 4.11.2011

Name: Muneer
Description:
-

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Pakistan Today, 05.11.2011

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim was beaten and stabbed by members of youth gangs in the early morning of 4th November 2011 and died in hospital on the 8th. Six youths were detained and charged with murder.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: La Manana Online, online journal, 9.11.2011 59
